scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && yarn start" "cd client && yarn start" "cd client/admin && yarn start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && yarn run dev" "cd client && yarn run dev" "cd client/admin && yarn run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && yarn build" "cd client && yarn build" "cd client/admin && yarn build"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd server && yarn test" "cd client && yarn test" "cd client/admin && yarn test"
